Package io.honeycomb.beeline.tracing.propagation

Class HttpHeaderV1PropagationCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.honeycomb.beeline.tracing.propagation.HttpHeaderV1PropagationCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PropagationCodec<String>

    public class HttpHeaderV1PropagationCodec
extends Object
implements PropagationCodec<String>
    Codec that can decode/encode trace context based on Version 1 of the honeycomb http header ('x-honeycomb-trace'). Prefer the Propagation.honeycombHeaderV1() factory method to retrieve an instance.

    The design of this class avoids throwing exceptions in favour of logging warnings and returning null on encode or an "empty context" on decode.

    Thread-safety

    Instances of this class are thread-safe and can be shared.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static HttpHeaderV1PropagationCodec getInstance​()

      • decode

        public PropagationContext decode​(String encodedTrace)
        This decodes the 'x-honeycomb-trace' header of the following format:

        1;trace_id={traceId},parent_id={parentId},dataset={dataset},context={Base64-encoded json}

        Trace_id and parent_id are required to create a non-empty Propagation context, while dataset and context are treated as optional.

        Specified by:
        decode in interface PropagationCodec<String>
        Parameters:
        encodedTrace - to decode into a PropagationContext.
        Returns:
        extracted context - "empty" context if encodedTrace value has an invalid format or is null.

      • encode

        public Optional<String> encode​(PropagationContext context)
        This encodes the given trace context in the format accepted by the 'x-honeycomb-trace' header. This will return null if the span id or trace id are not set (i.e. the context is not an active trace).
        Specified by:
        encode in interface PropagationCodec<String>
        Parameters:
        context - to encode into a valid header value.
        Returns:
        a valid honeycomb trace header value - empty if required IDs are missing or input is null.
